alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 10:37PM CST until March 04 at 1:36PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tennessee River at Florence affecting Colbert and Lauderdale Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tennessee River at Florence. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Alabama State Highway 20 is flooded at the underpass below U.S. Highways 43 and 72. The underpass will likely be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CST Tuesday was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 14.9 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.5 feet on 07/12/1916. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
